newsitem.title: USA: CitFed raises qtrly dividend to $0.09/shr.
newsitem.headline: CitFed raises qtrly dividend to $0.09/shr.

text.p: CitFed Bancorp Inc said Friday it raised its quarterly cash dividend to $0.09 a share from $0.08 a share.
The bank holding company said it will pay the dividend August 29 to stockholders of record on August 15.
